Hi all - 

Just trying to identify the place name on this interesting shinto wakizashi by Kaga Kiyohira. I've placed a scan of this inscription in Yahoo photos, my album Ron STL, photo: oite Kiyohira what. http://tinyurl.com/q4uz2

This smith apparently moved around a lot but I can't figure out just where he was when he signed this particular sword. Any clues???  Thanks!

Ron
STL
